articles.title: Top Asian Oil Buyers in Turmoil after Sweeping Russian Sanctions - Bloomberg
articles.description: Refiners, tanker operators and port executives across Asia have been left scrambling to manage the fallout from the most aggressive US sanctions on Russia’s oil industry to date, sifting through documents and quizzing government officials on Monday to underst…
